Project.Brief history of your project and organi: Dear allocator, Filecoin Foundation and PL, I am a Filecoin enthusiast and technology geek. I do not belong to any company, but I have been working on the Filecoin network for two years. We are familiar with Filecoin technical principles and technical architecture, and are familiar with data storage and maintenance. With various major processes and DC experience, we are already downloading the data of LAMOST DR7.
Project.Describe the data being stored onto File:
Released to the public as part of the Department of Energy's Open Energy Data Initiative, the National Solar Radiation Database (NSRDB) is a serially complete collection of hourly and half-hourly values of the three most common measurements of solar radiation – global horizontal, direct normal, and diffuse horizontal irradiance — and meteorological data. These data have been collected at a sufficient number of locations and temporal and spatial scales to accurately represent regional solar radiation climates."

Source: https://registry.opendata.aws/nrel-pds-nsrdb/
